short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor the National Weather Service alerts for your area

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Public Alerter is your personal weather watchdog, keeping you up-to-date with the latest National Weather Service alerts directly in your browser. Never miss a critical warning again!

Features:

Personalized Alerts: Monitor alerts for multiple locations, whether it's your home, workplace, or any area you care about.
Customizable Location Types: Choose between broad areas (e.g., states) or precise geographic coordinates for hyperlocal alerts.
Easy-to-Read Notifications: Receive clear and concise notifications with essential alert details, including the type of alert, affected areas, and duration.
Real-Time Updates: Get alerts as they happen, thanks to automatic background updates.
Clean and Intuitive Interface: Easily manage your saved locations and view active alerts within the extension's streamlined popup.
Peace of Mind: Know that you and your loved ones are prepared for any weather event.
Benefits:

Stay Safe: Receive timely notifications about severe weather threats like tornadoes, floods, thunderstorms, and more.
Plan Ahead: Make informed decisions about your day based on the latest weather forecasts and warnings.
Never Miss an Alert: Even if you're busy working or browsing, you'll be notified of critical weather events.
Simple and Reliable: Public Alerter is easy to set up and use, so you can focus on what matters most.
How to Use:

Install: Add Public Alerter to your Chrome browser.
Set Up Locations: Open the extension's settings and add the locations you want to monitor.
Stay Informed: Get automatic alerts in your browser for the areas you've selected.
Don't let unexpected weather disrupt your plans. Download Public Alerter today and stay informed, stay safe!
